text: The iPod Touch (7th generation) (also known as iPod Touch (2019) or iPod Touch 7) is a discontinued mobile device developed and marketed by Apple. It was released on 28 May 2019. It was discontinued on 10 May 2022. It was last product in the iPod product series before being discontinued. == Features == The iPod Touch 7 has 4.0 inch IPS LCD screen, Apple A10 Fusion (16 nm), 32GB/128GB/256GB storage, 2GB RAM, 8MP back camera, 1.2MP HDR selfie camera, 40 hours of music playback and 8 hours of video playback battery and Bluetooth 4.1. == Software == The iPod Touch 7 runs iOS 12.3 for the first time, it can upgrade to other versions like iOS 13, iOS 14 and iOS 15 when they came out. == References == == Other websites == * Category:IPod Category:Apple products released in 2010s
title: IPod Touch (7th generation)
